lua::LuaObject Class Reference
[Scripting support library (Lua C++ wrapper)]

#include <LuaObject.h>

Inheritance diagram for lua::LuaObject:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for C++ objects which are extended by Lua scripts.

Provides functionality for mapping C++ methods to Lua.


Public Member Functions

template<class T>
void lua::LuaObject::registerLuaMethod (  const char *  name,
T *  obj,
int(T::*  func)(LuaState *)
) 
 

Registers C++ method which uses LuaState directly.

Method has fixed function calling convention, returns int and accepts one argument, LuaState*. Arguments passed from the script to the function are passed on top of Lua stack, and return value(s) are returned on top of Lua stack. Function should return number of return values in Lua stack.

Parameters:
T Class which has methods of type F.
name Name of the method to be added in the Lua table.
obj Object to be used as 'this' when calling the method.
func Method to be called.

template<typename T, typename F>
void lua::LuaObject::registerMethod (  const char *  name,
T *  obj,
F  func
) 
 

Registers normal C++ method which can be used from Lua scripts.

Parameters:
T Class which has methods of type F.
F Method of class T.
name Name of the method to be added in the Lua table.
obj Object to be used as 'this' when calling the method.
func Method to be called.
